name: Ruto
description: A Nmekufian citizen who can join you on your adventures.

dialogs.responseText: Hello! You must be from the surface. I never thought I would meet someone from down below who wasn't a weird wizard.
Join you? Like, on an adventure? I don't know... I've never known anything but the great tree. I don't think I could leave everything behind me.
I don't have a need for any kind of payment. The great tree supplies everything we need.
Oh! I never thought I'd see this again! Thank you so much! I don't know how I could ever repay you for this.
Hello! You must be from the surface. I never thought I would meet someone from down below who wasn't a weird wizard.

Well, I guess that isn't completely true. A few weeks ago I was out harvesting fruit when I noticed my necklace was missing. It was a gift from my mother and it means a lot to me. If you managed to find it I think I could change my mind.
Every few months we get a wizard as a visitor. One of them lives in the village, you probably noticed the strange building on your way here.
Either to gather some of the fruit from the tree, or to argue. Often it's both at the same time. When they are finished, they vanish in a flash of light.
I did say I might be willing to do that... Okay. I will follow you. I don't know how to do much, but I am quite skilled at gathering and collecting things.
